nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Atmosphere is turbulent. Lightning traces along the crystal spires. Prepare landing procedures?

choices.text: Prepare the landing party and gear.
Go in hot. We’ll improvise on the ground.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Loadouts checked. Ropes, breather masks, dampeners. We’re ready, Captain.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Descent vector locked. Expect crosswinds and micro-shards. Touchdown in three.
